name: A no way back
description:
Hey, 

this is my second entry on a Gamejam and my first for the Begginers Circle Jam. This is a top down shooter and your main goal is to get a high score as you can or want. You are a astronaut send on a deadly mission to get as many space rocks as you can for money resources (Yeah, I know its dumb).

  • Game Created in Construct 3 (solo)
  • Graphic made completely in Aseprite
  • Sound effects created in Bfxr
  • Music downloaded "8 Bit Surf" (by David Renda) from a "fesliyanstudios"

I hope anyone that play will enjoy this game.
